survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Station User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to improve service quality, accessibility, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover the full range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of electric vehicle do you drive?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of electric vehicle do you drive?

questions.question_text: Which of the following EV charging networks have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkboxes (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following EV charging networks have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of charging stations in your usual travel areas?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction. Display as radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of charging stations in your usual travel areas?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see at public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see at public EV charging stations?
